Fae0.name: Fae Core (Fire)
Fae0.description: The core harvested from a fire fae spirit. Brimming with elemental energies.

Fae1.name: Fae Core (Water)
Fae1.description: The core harvested from a water fae spirit. Brimming with elemental energies.

Fae2.name: Fae Core (Lightning)
Fae2.description: The core harvested from a lightning fae spirit. Brimming with elemental energies.

Fae3.name: Fae Core (Earth)
Fae3.description: The core harvested from an earth fae spirit. Brimming with elemental energies.

Fae4.name: Fae Core (Wind)
Fae4.description: The core harvested from a wind fae spirit. Brimming with elemental energies.

Fae5.name: Fae Core (Ice)
Fae5.description: The core harvested from an ice fae spirit. Brimming with elemental energies.

Fae6.name: Fae Core (Shadow)
Fae6.description: The core harvested from a shadow fae spirit. Brimming with elemental energies.

Fae7.name: Fae Core (Light)
Fae7.description: The core harvested from a light fae spirit. Brimming with elemental energies.

Fae8.name: Fae Core (Celestial)
Fae8.description: The core harvested from a celestial fae spirit. Brimming with elemental energies.

Token1.name: Changeling Token
Token1.description: An ancient token. Can be used to change your class or username.

Token2.name: Soulweaver Token
Token2.description: An ancient token. Can be used for insignia engraving and upgrades.

Token3.name: Pathwalker Token
Token3.description: An ancient token. Can be used to reset all skill points.

Token4.name: Lifeblood Token
Token4.description: An ancient token. Can be used to reshape dragon heart gems.

Token5.name: Scribe Token
Token5.description: An ancient token. Can be used to enscribe weapons.

Token6.name: Oracle Token
Token6.description: An ancient token. Can be used to obtain lotus items.

Summon1.name: Summoning Relic
Summon1.description: Perform a summoning ritual to summon a tier 5 paragon solo boss.

Summon2.name: Summoning Artifact
Summon2.description: Perform a summoning ritual to summon a tier 6 paragon solo boss.

Summon3.name: Summoning Prism
Summon3.description: Perform a summoning ritual to summon a tier 7 arbiter solo boss.

Stone1.name: Fortress Stone
Stone1.description: Obtained from fortress bosses. It's a stone.

Stone2.name: Dragon Stone
Stone2.description: Obtained from dragon bosses. It's a stone.

Stone3.name: Demon Stone
Stone3.description: Obtained from demon bosses. It's a stone.

Stone4.name: Paragon Stone
Stone4.description: Obtained from paragon bosses. It's a stone.

Stone5.name: Ruler's Stone
Stone5.description: Obtained from ruler bosses. It's a stone.

Stone6.name: Arbiter Stone
Stone6.description: Obtained from arbiter bosses. It's a stone.

Trove1.name: Lesser Lotus Trove
Trove1.description: Open to receive 1,000 - 5,000 lotus coins. Lotus chance: 0.001%

Trove2.name: Standard Lotus Trove
Trove2.description: Open to receive 5,000 - 10,000 lotus coins. Lotus chance: 0.010%

Trove3.name: Greater Lotus Trove
Trove3.description: Open to receive 10,000 - 20,000 lotus coins. Lotus chance: 0.050%

Trove4.name: Ultimate Lotus Trove
Trove4.description: Open to receive 20,000 - 35,000 lotus coins. Lotus chance: 0.100%

Trove5.name: Voidworn Lotus Trove
Trove5.description: Open to receive 35,000 - 50,000 lotus coins. Lotus chance: 0.500%

Trove6.name: Miraculous Lotus Trove
Trove6.description: Open to receive 50,000 - 75,000 lotus coins. Lotus chance: 1.000%

Trove7.name: Abyssal Lotus Trove
Trove7.description: Open to receive 75,000 - 100,000 lotus coins. Lotus chance: 2.000%

Trove8.name: Divine Lotus Trove
Trove8.description: Open to receive 100,000 - 1,000,000 lotus coins. Lotus chance: 3.000%

Ore1.name: Crude Ore
Ore1.description: Ore with 2% purity. Used for reinforcing gear items. Increasing the quality.

Ore2.name: Cosmite Ore
Ore2.description: Ore with 5% purity. Used for reinforcing gear items. Increasing the quality.

Ore3.name: Celestite Ore
Ore3.description: Ore with 10% purity. Used for reinforcing gear items. Increasing the quality.

Ore4.name: Crystallite Ore
Ore4.description: Ore with 50% purity. Used for reinforcing gear items. Increasing the quality.

Ore5.name: Heavenly Ore
Ore5.description: Ore with 100% purity. Used for reinforcing gear items. Increasing the quality.

Flame1.name: Purgatorial Flame
Flame1.description: 75% chance to reforge the base stats and unique ability of a gear item within its tier.

Flame2.name: Abyss Flame
Flame2.description: 50% chance to reroll a unique ability on tier 5+ gear.

Fragment1.name: Fragmentized Void
Fragment1.description: A fragment containing the essence of the void. Used for forging, infusion and crafting.

Fragment2.name: Fragmentized Wish
Fragment2.description: A fragment containing the essence of a wish. Used for forging, infusion and crafting.

Fragment3.name: Fragmentized Abyss
Fragment3.description: A fragment containing the essence of the abyss. Used for forging, infusion and crafting.

Fragment4.name: Fragmentized Divinity
Fragment4.description: A fragment containing the essence of divinity. Used for forging, infusion and crafting.

Crystal1.name: Crystallized Void
Crystal1.description: A crystal containing the essence of the void. Used for forging, infusion and crafting.

Crystal2.name: Crystallized Wish
Crystal2.description: A crystal containing the essence of a wish. Used for forging, infusion and crafting.

Crystal3.name: Crystallized Abyss
Crystal3.description: A crystal containing the essence of the abyss. Used for forging, infusion and crafting.

Crystal4.name: Crystallized Divinity
Crystal4.description: A crystal containing the essence of divinity. Used for forging, infusion and crafting.

Skull1.name: Cursed Golden Skull
Skull1.description: A skull of pure gold that whispers to you softly.

Skull2.name: Haunted Golden Skull
Skull2.description: A golden skull that exudes darkness. Placing it against your ear is clearly a bad idea.

Skull3.name: Radiant Golden Skull
Skull3.description: A golden skull with a serene aura. Yet screaming can occasionally be heard from within. [Ultra Rare]

Skull4.name: Prismatic Golden Skull
Skull4.description: A golden skull that sparkles extraordinarily. Beware the lustful voices calling your name. [Ultimate Rare]

Void1.name: Unrefined Void Item (Sword)
Void1.description: Refine for 50% chance to receive a tier 5 sword.

Void2.name: Unrefined Void Item (Axe)
Void2.description: Refine for 50% chance to receive a tier 5 axe.

Void3.name: Unrefined Void Item (Bow)
Void3.description: Refine for 50% chance to receive a tier 5 bow.

Void4.name: Unrefined Void Item (Shield)
Void4.description: Refine for 50% chance to receive a tier 5 shield.

Void5.name: Unrefined Void Item (Armor)
Void5.description: Refine for 50% chance to receive a tier 5 armor.

Void6.name: Unrefined Void Item (Helm)
Void6.description: Refine for 50% chance to receive a tier 5 helm.

Unrefined1.name: Unrefined Dragon Wings
Unrefined1.description: Refine for 75% chance to receive tier 2-4 dragon wings.

Unrefined2.name: Unrefined Demon Greaves
Unrefined2.description: Refine for 75% chance to receive a tier 2-4 demon Greaves.

Unrefined3.name: Unrefined Paragon Crest
Unrefined3.description: Refine for 75% chance to receive a tier 2-4 paragon crest.

Gem1.name: Unrefined Dragon Gem
Gem1.description: Refine for 75% chance to receive tier 2-4 dragon gem.

Gem2.name: Unrefined Demon Gem
Gem2.description: Refine for 75% chance to receive a tier 2-4 demon gem.

Gem3.name: Unrefined Paragon Gem
Gem3.description: Refine for 75% chance to receive a tier 2-4 paragon gem.

Jewel1.name: Unrefined Dragon Jewel
Jewel1.description: Refine for 50% chance to receive tier 5-8 dragon jewel.

Jewel2.name: Unrefined Demon Jewel
Jewel2.description: Refine for 50% chance to receive a tier 5-8 demon jewel.

Jewel3.name: Unrefined Paragon Jewel
Jewel3.description: Refine for 50% chance to receive a tier 5-8 paragon jewel.

Jewel4.name: Unrefined Arbiter Jewel
Jewel4.description: Refine for 50% chance to receive a tier 6-8 arbiter jewel.

Jewel5.name: Unrefined Incarnate Jewel
Jewel5.description: Refine for 50% chance to receive a tier 7-8 incarnate jewel.

Lotus1.name: Lotus of Nightmares
Lotus1.description: Used for Divine Synthesis (Weapon). Increases the tier to 8. [Ultra Rare]

Lotus2.name: Lotus of Prosperity
Lotus2.description: Used for Divine Purification (Amulet). Increases the tier to 8. [Ultra Rare]

Lotus3.name: Lotus of Serenity
Lotus3.description: Used for Divine Purification (Greaves). Increases the tier to 8. [Ultra Rare]

Lotus4.name: Lotus of Freedom
Lotus4.description: Used for Divine Purification (Wings). Increases the tier to 8. [Ultra Rare]

Lotus5.name: Lotus of Eternity
Lotus5.description: Used for Divine Melding (Jewels). Increases the tier to 8. [Ultra Rare]

Lotus6.name: Lotus of Abundance
Lotus6.description: Used for Divine Purification (Armour). Increases the tier to 8. [Ultra Rare]

Lotus7.name: Lotus of Domination
Lotus7.description: Used for Divine Purification (Crest). Increases the tier to 8. [Ultra Rare]

Lotus8.name: Lotus of Divergence
Lotus8.description: Used for Divine Mutation (Insignia). Increases the tier to 8. [Ultra Rare]

Lotus9.name: Lotus of Revelations
Lotus9.description: Used for Divine Synthesis (Tarot). Increases the tier to 8. [Ultra Rare]

Lotus10.name: Divine Lotus
Lotus10.description: The key to divinity and the object of the Arbiter's worship. [Uber Rare]

Lotus11.name: Rainbow Lotus
Lotus11.description: A mythical lotus dyed by the colours of fate. [Ultimate Rare]

Gemstone0.name: Blazing Ruby
Gemstone0.description: Pulsing with volcanic force, this gem radiates with an intense heat.

Gemstone1.name: Drowned Sapphire
Gemstone1.description: Formed from colliding waves and tides, this gem holds the depths of the ocean within.

Gemstone2.name: Silent Topaz
Gemstone2.description: Crackling with electricity, this gem is often used as an energy source.

Gemstone3.name: Ancient Agate
Gemstone3.description: Hardened by the earth, this gem has a high density and is exceptionally sturdy.

Gemstone4.name: Whispering Emerald
Gemstone4.description: A destructive gale condensed into a single stone, air leaks out from this gem creating a gentle breeze.

Gemstone5.name: Arctic Zircon
Gemstone5.description: Despite the chilling aura, this gem's pure surface mirrors its surroundings.

Gemstone6.name: Haunted Obsidian
Gemstone6.description: Dark and ominous, this small gem casts a foreboding shadow.

Gemstone7.name: Prismatic Opal
Gemstone7.description: Gleaming with radiance, it shines with all kinds of vibrant colours.

Gemstone8.name: Spatial Lapis
Gemstone8.description: Shimmering endlessly, the inside of this gem is boundless like the starry night.

Gemstone9.name: Soul Diamond
Gemstone9.description: A gem of crystallized soul, a priceless treasure.

Gemstone10.name: Aurora Tear
Gemstone10.description: If you gaze within you can make out the remnants of the dream from which it was formed.

Gemstone11.name: Stone of the True Void
Gemstone11.description: An impossible gem, it embodies the infinite nothingness within the depths of the void. [Uber Rare]

Catalyst.name: Gemstone Catalyst
Catalyst.description: A hollow transparent gemstone. It's true nature can be revealed through elemental infusion.

Hammer.name: Astral Hammer
Hammer.description: Used to reroll specific item rolls. Works on tier 4 and lower gear items.

Pearl.name: Stellar Pearl
Pearl.description: Augments an item roll. Increases the tier by 1.

Matrix.name: Socket Matrix
Matrix.description: 5% Chance to add a socket to a gear item.

Shard.name: Sovereign Shard
Shard.description: A fragment of an ancient weapon. Perhaps it can be reforged.

Scrap.name: Equipment Scrap
Scrap.description: One of many countless pieces of Pandora's Legendary Hammer.

Compass.name: Illusory Compass
Compass.description: An enigmatic compass said to be capable of locating the Spire of Illusions.

DarkStar.name: Dark Star of Shattered Dreams
DarkStar.description: Legend tells of a star engulfed in black flames that heralds great disasters. The old records describe visions of the dark star blocking out the sun leaving chaos in its wake. [Uber Rare]

LightStar.name: Glittering Star of Fractured Hearts
LightStar.description: Legend tells of a star often spotted by lovers as it dazzles and sparkles amidst the black night. The old records indicate that the star was so beautiful it would steal the hearts of those who saw it. [Uber Rare]

Nadir.name: Phantasm of Nadir
Nadir.description: Amidst the vastest oceans, this tiny fish is exceedingly elusive. They dwell in the deepest trenches. Their pitch-black scales conceal precious and unique gems that grow inside their small bodies. [Ultimate Rare]

RoyalCoin.name: Royal Lotus Coin
RoyalCoin.description: A sacred coin blessed by gods. It is said to be indestructible.

Nephilim.name: Nephilim's Wicked Heart
Nephilim.description: The heart of the lotus incarnate. Its divine luster has long since withered away, leaving a lingering resentment in its place. [Ultimate Rare]

Pandora.name: Pandora's Twinkling Heart
Pandora.description: The spiritual heart of the celestial paragon. At the dawn of creation, Pandora bore her celestial heart as a power source for her hammer. [Ultimate Rare]

Ruler.name: Ruler's Crown Jewel
Ruler.description: A jewel of unmatched quality, unparalleled value, and unfathomable beauty. A truly unique treasure. [Ultimate Rare]

Sacred.name: Sacred Blood
Sacred.description: Rare drop from raid bosses. Can be optionally consumed as an additional cost to guarantee a 'Sacred' outcome during infusion. It can also be used to upgrade tier 8 gear to tier 9. [Ultimate Rare]

Salvation.name: Seal of Salvation
Salvation.description: Rare drop from raid bosses. Can be consumed to guarantee an on-class skill roll on an Amulet. [Ultimate Rare]

Metamorphite.name: Metamorphite Ore
Metamorphite.description: A mysterious ore that can drastically change an item.
